400.description: If the problem persists, contact your System Administrator.

403.description: Your role does not allow you to perform this operation. Contact your Security Administrator to change your access rights.

404.description: The service is currently unavailable. Please retry your request later. If the problem persists, contact your System Administrator.

500.description: The server encountered an internal error.

unknown.description: There was an unknown server error. If the problem persists, contact your System Administrator.

-3.description: Save ongoing, please check later if it was successful.

-999.description: The server encountered an internal error. Please try again later.

10014.description: Unable to establish a database connection. Please try again later.

10015.description: Your role does not allow you to perform this operation. Contact your Security Administrator to change your access rights.

10025.description: We cannot find the requested object. It may have been removed or is not available at this time. Please try again later.

10027.description: The service is currently unavailable. Please retry your request later. If the problem persists, contact your System Administrator.

10106.description: There is currently no capacity to process the request due to a large amount of activity on the server. Please try again later.
